How can I engage with the Verus community and learn more about the protocol?

You can engage with the Verus community and learn more about the protocol by discussing and exploring all that Verus has to offer on Discord, following Verus on Twitter, and visiting the official Verus website at verus.io.

What are some ways to stay updated about Verus and its developments?

You can stay updated about Verus and its developments by following Verus on Twitter, joining the community on Discord, and visiting the official Verus website at verus.io. These platforms provide a means to stay informed about the latest news, updates, and announcements from the Verus team and community.
